page.title: 01Cardiff South 2
page.content: 50% of our block is covered with sea.25% covered in mudflats.The rest of the block comprises of land that was once flat marshland seldom rising above 12 metres above sea level.Land can be conveniently split into; 1.{Residential.}Splott.Tremorfa and Pengam.Inner city area striving to recover from closure of East Moors Steelworks in 1978. 2.{Parkland.}Two main parks;Moorland Park and Splott Park.Each contains playing fields with Splott Park also containing;Tennis courts,Indoor swimming pool,bowling green,flower gardens. 3.{Industrial Landscape.}variety of industries;high technology units,steel and wire rolling mills,small individual workshop units inside converted buildings,railway sidings and wasteground.
